intro.headline: Stay comfortably in a historic house
intro.paragraph_1: Our guesthouse combines the charm of a historic building with modern comfort. It can accommodate up to 4 guests and has everything you need for a relaxing stay.

testimonial.quote: The house was spotless, well equipped and felt like home.
testimonial.author: Claire, 2025

intro.paragraph_2: Whether you’re visiting as a couple or with your family, Schermer Eylandt is the perfect place to slow down and recharge.

photo_gallery.title: Photo Gallery
photo_gallery.description: Discover bright rooms, a cozy living area and beautiful views over the countryside. Everything is designed with care — from your first morning coffee to the last rays of sunlight on the terrace.

extra_comfort.note: Every detail has been thought through, so all you need to do is relax and enjoy.

closing_cta.title: Plan your stay
closing_cta.description: Wake up to views across the polder and end the day in peaceful silence. At Schermer Eylandt, time truly slows down.
